newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 1.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 1.

text.p: These were the headlines on Estonian Kuku radio in the early afternoon. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The decision to bring down the Tartu municipal government was made by the chiefs of Coalition Party and Reform Party.

- Estonian Foreign Minister Toomas Ilves discussed with United Nations secretary general Estonia's participation in peace keeping and cooperation between Baltic and Nordic countries in New York on Monday.
